Articles.Content:
Yo!

I was wondering how KSP plugins really work. I believe so it's done in C#(correct me if I'm wrong) and I have some knowledge of C# and I have been using Unity for a little while now. I was thinking: How do you make a plugin in KSP. Like something simple. A menu that gives you a quest or something to do! So please help me on how you would do this.

To summarize if you don't get it. How do you code a plugin in KSP!

Thanks in advance!

SRG

There isn't a lot of documentation around,

A plugin is one or a set of dll.

You can find some good example here and there.

basically it's all about getting your code to run. Unity and KSP both offer an assortment of methods you can hook into or override, plus a set of GameEvents, pick thing that makes your code run at the time that you want it to and then do stuff until you're confused.

You can find some good example here and there.

THIS. The examples by Taranis are incredibly useful.
